headline: Japan Issues a Warrant for Ghosn’s Wife
abstract: The authorities said they suspect Carole Ghosn gave false testimony in April related to the allegations against her husband.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO — The Japanese authorities said on Tuesday that they had issued a warrant for the arrest of Carole Ghosn, the wife of Carlos Ghosn, taking direct aim at the family of the fallen auto magnate as they sought to bring him back to the country to face criminal charges.
